capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for coordinating and supervising operations to ensure revenue generation and service quality.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Needs to effectively manage visitor centre operations, including events and retail, requiring planning and prioritization.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountable for the financial performance, stock control, and security of the visitor centre.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Responsible for recruiting, supervising, and developing staff, volunteers, and contractors.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must have strong communication skills to provide exceptional service and support to the team.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Essential to provide customer-centric services to visitors, ensuring a great experience.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Requires experience managing financial budgets and reporting for the visitor centre.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Involves coordinating marketing and events management, akin to project management tasks.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Leading a small frontline team to deliver exceptional visitor services.

skills.name: Retail Management Systems
skills.description: Using systems for financial performance, stock control, and security monitoring.

skills.name: Customer Service Excellence
skills.description: Ensuring visitors have a great experience through high-quality service.

generalRole.title: Visitor Centre Supervisor
generalRole.description: This role involves supervising and coordinating the operations of a visitor centre, including staff management, customer service, financial reporting, and project management related to events and marketing.
